settings.title: Widest Range of Products
settings.desc: With more than 1000 products on our catalogue, mostly in stock at our depots located country wide ,we are able to offer fast reliable delivery of quality approved products to any site location in South Africa. Competitive rates guaranteed.

settings.heading: Quality First Product
settings.sub_heading: Are you still looking for the right material for your next project ? We have all the products you need, for high-quality first materials at affordable prices.
settings.desc_1: Premium supplier of quality crushed stone, aggregates, road base and sub-base materials including G1 to G7 , Gravel stone from 6mm , 9mm, 13mm , 19mm, 22mm , 28mm and 38mm , Delivered Nationwide
settings.desc_2: Widest Range of Paving , Building and Landscaping Bricks. Available in Grey, Tan , Terracotta , Charcoal and delivered Nationwide. Building Bricks, Interlocking Paving Bricks, Bevel Bond Pavers , Interlocking bricks and Clay Stock and Paving Bricks.
settings.desc_3: Washed Clean River Sand, Building Sand, and Plaster Sand bulk supply direct to your project. Quick Efficient Deliveries. We supply and distribute bulk sand products Nationwide. River Sand, Pit Sand, Plaster Sand.
settings.desc_4: When you need hot asphalt delivered in a hurry, you can count on us to provide you with the right product in the right quantity in the right place.

settings.title: Best Selling Deals
settings.small_title: You don't have to compromise on quality. You can buy Inframat products quickly and reliably at any site in South Africa without compromising on quality standards. Shop Now.

settings.title: Concert Product
settings.small_title: The future of supply chain management. Inframat's revolutionary supply chain management software helps you find, order and deliver quality products at any site within South Africa.
